SEARCH
Package sttrswing.model

Class Quadrant

Object
Quadrant
All Implemented Interfaces:
HasPosition, Hittable
public class Quadrant extends Object implements Hittable, HasPosition
Quadrant are sections of space with a randomised mixture of Stars, Klingons and Starbases.

  • Constructor Details

    • Quadrant

      public Quadrant(int galaxyX, int galaxyY)
      Constructs a Quadrant at the given coordinates.
      Parameters:
      galaxyX - - horizontal coordinate for this Quadrant in the Galaxy.
      galaxyY - - vertical coordinate for this Quadrant in the Galaxy.

    • Quadrant

      public Quadrant(int galaxyX, int galaxyY, int starbases, int klingons, int stars)
      Used only for testing, so we can specify a given number of Starbase, Klingon and Star to be generated in a given Quadrant in a very specific order for predictability when testing.
      Parameters:
      galaxyX - - horizontal coordinate
      galaxyY - - vertical coordinate
      starbases - - number of Starbase for the Quadrant to place on empty sectors in this Quadrant
      klingons - - number of Klingon for the Quadrant to place on empty sectors in this Quadrant
      stars - - number of Star for the Quadrant to place on empty sectors in this Quadrant Because this constructor is used only for testing, we want the Starbase, Klingon and Star placed in a set pattern it is expected we will place all the Starbase, then all the Klingon and then all the Star going from the top left to the bottom right placing in empty x,y coords until we have placed the given number of each.

      Ps. As a reminder only one Starbase, Star or Klingon should be at a specific x,y coordinate for the Quadrant, they should never overlap.

    • getSymbolAt

      public String getSymbolAt(int x, int y)
      Returns the 3 character String symbol at the given x,y coordinates checking the Stars, Klingons, and Starbases for any of those at the given coordinates, if none are returns " ".
      Parameters:
      x - - horizontal coordinate.
      y - - vertical coordinate.
      Returns:
      3 character String symbol.

    • getEntityAt

      public Entity getEntityAt(int x, int y)
      Searches the Quadrant for any Entitys at the given location.
      Parameters:
      x - - horizontal coordinate
      y - - vertical coordinate
      Returns:
      - if there is an Entity at the given x, y coordinate in the Quadrant return that, otherwise return null.

    • scan

      public void scan()
      Scan every Klingon, Starbase and Star in this Quadrant.

    • symbol

      public String symbol()
      Returns a String representation of the Quadrant formatted as DIGITDIGITDIGIT i.e. 123
      • the first number is how many Star there are in this Quadrant.
      • the second number is how many Starbase there are in this Quadrant.
      • the third number is how many Klingon there are in this Quadrant.

      So a Quadrant with 2 Stars, 0 Starbases and 3 Klingons would have a String representation of 203.

      Returns:
      a String representation of the Quadrant

    • tick

      public void tick(Game game)
      Handles a 'turn' of the Game for the Starbases and Klingons in this Quadrant. Intended to be called only if the Quadrant is currently active.
      Parameters:
      game - - the current Game state for us to manipulate.

    • outOfFocusTick

      public void outOfFocusTick(Game game)
      Intended to be called when you are not in this Quadrant. If a sector has 2 or less Klingons in it, any Starbase in the Quadrant will restore 10 energy. If there are 3 or more Klingons in the sector instead the starbase should lose 1 energy as its supply lines are cut off by Klingon raids.
      Parameters:
      game - - game state we want to manipulate

    • hit

      public void hit(int damage)
      Hit every Hittable Klingon in this Quadrant.
      Specified by:
      hit in interface Hittable
      Parameters:
      damage - - how much damage to do to EACH Klingon.

    • cleanup

      public void cleanup()
      Removes any Klingon and Starbase that have been marked for removal from their respective List. Only public for testing purposes.
